not_owner_error: **Only my developer can use this command**
selection_timeout_error: There was an issue with my database
bot_missing_permissions_error: I lack the following permissions to execute this command: ```{permissions}```
missing_permissions_error: You lack the following permissions to execute this command: ```{permissions}```
no_private_message_error: This command cannot be run in private messages.
command_on_cooldown_error: **You must wait {time} more before using this command again.**
nsfw_required: Cannot execute this command; the channel must be age-restricted
diff_voice: You must be in my voice channel to execute this command
no_player: No player has been initialized on this server
no_voice: You must join a voice channel to use this command.
no_connect_perm: I am not allowed to connect/speak in the channel: {channel}
load_failed: ‚ùå An error occurred while searching for the requested song
invalid_in_livestream: You cannot do this during a livestream
invalid_seek_value: **Invalid value! Use seconds (1 or 2 digits) or in the format (minutes):(seconds)**
